full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
=============================

#### Service of Mechanical Maintenance and Repair

The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a firm specialized in mechanical building maintenance services.

#### Tender Details
-------------------

| **Field** | **Value** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | cb-824-33040360 | Unique identifier for the tender process |
| **Solicitation Number** | 9F030-23-0295 | Unique identifier for the solicitation process |
| **Publication Date** | 2024-01-18 | Date the tender announcement was published |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2024-02-07T14:00:00 | Deadline for submission of proposals |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | 2024-04-01 | Planned start date for the contract |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | 2026-03-31 | Planned end date for the contract |

#### Tender Origin
-----------------

The CSA site at 6767 Route de l'Aéroport, Longueuil, Quebec, Canada (John H. Chapman Space Centre, JHCSC) requires a firm specializing in mechanical building maintenance services.

#### Description
-------------

The initial period of the contract is 2 years, with 5 optional years. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing mechanical maintenance and repair services for the CSA site.

#### Notice and Contact Information
--------------------------------------

For more information regarding this tender announcement, please refer to the attached documents via the link below:

* [French link for RFP document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29799/9f030-23-0295---demande-de-proposition-%28ddp---service-d_entretien-et-de-reparation-mecanique.pdf)
* [English link for RFP document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29799/9f030-23-0295---request-for-proposal-%28rfp---mechanical-maintenance-and-repair-services.pdf)
